Reviews.Title: “There is a nicer Comfort Suites in nearby Peoria, AZ”
Reviews.Author: marathon308
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel sunday night mistake reserved accessible worn front desk replaced hotel deserted front desk service mediocre free wifi breakfast included ample parking space reserved 80 following night stayed comfort suites peoria az 15 miles enjoyed
